description: Detects tempering with the "Enabled" registry key in order to disable windows logging of a windows event channel
false_positives: Legitimate administrators disabling specific event log for troubleshooting
name: Disable Winevt Event Logging Via Registry
query: ((winlog.event_data.EventType:"SetValue" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:HKLM\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\WINEVT\\Channels\\* AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Enabled AND winlog.event_data.Details:"DWORD\ \(0x00000000\)") AND (NOT ((process.executable:*\\Windows\\system32\\wevtutil.exe) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\winsxs\\* AND process.executable:*\\TiWorker.exe AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\WINEVT\\Channels\\Microsoft\-IIS\-*))))
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali
